I was late that day, so I didn't hear him. I was running so the bell wouldn't mark me late. I accidentally bumped into him, and knocked it all on me! I got up and he was staring at me.
"Mr. Jefferson? What happened?" I asked frantically.
"...5 years if work... Gone..."
"GINA!! YOU'RE GONNA SHRINK!" Annie yelled from across the room.
"Woah, take it easy girls... The shrinking proccess is __________"
15.title: Gina (same girl, different start)

151.content:
...fast. So you don't need to worry. Wait. Yes, you do! Gina! Whatever you do DON'T sue me!" I was lost when Annie said "shrink" and then I was back to earth, then I heard "fast". I almost started crying. I looked down and my clothes were way too loose on me. I walked next to Annie an she was looking down to me!
"How small will I be?!?" I yelled out. Annie was tall enough to pick me up like a baby! Annie quickly covered up my parts and picked my skirt.
"Here, try to cover you self up. I was small enough for the skirt to cover up half my body. And the skirt originally was only big enough to cover my waist to mid-thigh.
"Uhh. If your lucky, that's the smallest you'll go." Mr. Jefferson sounded like he was guessing.
"What do you mean "If you're lucky?!"
"Awww! That's such a cute baaaabbby! Whose is it?" Hailey was late. She didn't know what was happening.
"This "baby" is Gina. She shrunk." Annie explained while she put me down. I walked over to Hailey. I was about the size of her long and slender legs. She was looking at me and almost laughed.
"Eh, I'm more of a kidengardnerer's height. Wait, that gives me an idea. Can someone drive to the nearest pre-school and get me clothes?" I asked. Looking at Mr. Jefferson. He's the only one that can drive. I was barely holding up my favorite skirt.
151.title: Fast

152.content: .... At a medium rate. That's enough time to get started on a cure. I was already an inch shorter by the time he finished. My feet were getting smaller first for a reason. My feet where originally a size 7. Now they were about a two or three. It looked like clown shoes on me. So I decided to spend the day without shoes. The next period my legs were getting tinier. My skirt was up my mid-thigh. By mid class they covered up my thigh completely. I was about as tall as I was a year ago. Believe it or not, I was short last year. I was 4'11" in 7 grade. Everyone called me Shawn Johnson because I was blonde and short. But I got my growth spurt during summer and grew 10 inches. The shortest person was 5'3". And she was my all time best friend. She was the only one who stuck up for me when I was the only 4 feet tall girl in middle school. I was always ugly until my growth spurt when I guess I got prettier somehow. Like, the guys never liked me. But now they're all over me. But I looked like a freak. My legs were long! But since I have legs from 2 years ago, my upper body is more than half my body. I felt so qierd. My hands were almost touching the floor. But next period, my enitre upper body shrunk. Except my head. I was walking around with a giant head. Until, the repetitive process, next period it shrunk.
152.title: Medium

No cursing (crap and things among that level is ok, obvisously). No abrevation like "u" for "you" or "wat" or "wut" for "what". No being handed over to giant guys only girls. Keep it between +13.
